mods.abstract: ISSN-GOLD-OA provides a matching list of ISSN for Gold Open Access (OA) journals. The intention was to compile a matching table as complete as possible by using different publicly available sources. The dataset can help to clear various ISSN-related issues in bibliometric studies on Gold OA. New release (2017): [https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/data/2913654](https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/data/2913654).
